---
title: "Erika Sanitaria"
---

1.  Erika is a public health professional working at the Ministry of Health in Kenya for almost 2 years. She is looking forward to learning how to Explore data and Make rigorous conclusions from modelling and statistical inference outputs.
2.  Erika is competent in epidemiological concepts given her medical studies and field experience. She took the FETP (Field Epidemiology Training Program) under the TEPHINET (Training Programs in Epidemiology and Public Health Interventions Network)
3.  Erika wants to learn how to wrangle data and create visualisations useful for Situational Reports (sitreps). She also wants to learn how to interpret the outputs of stats and maths modelling generated by specialised R packages to inform stakeholders and the general public.
4.  Erika can read English well, but sometimes struggles to keep up with spoken conversation that involves a lot of jargon. She needs English subtitles in video tutorials.

## Needs

Erika wants where to look for stats/maths refreshers. She also wants mid-term mentoring, case-studies per disease type.
